body.name: PVA Sponge Mops for Floor Cleaning Squeeze with 60" Long Handle, Self Wringing Mop with 15" Head for Kitchen Bathroom Tiles, Sponge Mops for Floor Cleaning with Wringer DUDTO

features: Large size PVA mop – 15" PVA sponge mop Head and 60" Long Handle, Make cleaning easier. The unique design and structure of PVA mop heads can effectively clean various types of floors, including hardwood, tile, and laminate, without leaving streaks or residue. So PVA mops do not require the use of harsh chemicals.

You need a PVA sponge mop – All floor mops for cleaning will leave a lot of water stains, only the PVA sponge mop can absorb 80-90% of water. You don't worry about falling anymore. It works best on tiles, hardwood floors, marble, and your kitchen and bathroom.For use on wood floors recommended that the Angle between the PVA mop and the ground be less than 45° to reduce friction, and the Angle of 30° is the most energy saving.
Superior Absorbency: PVA material has high absorbency, allowing the mop to pick up and hold more water and dirt than traditional microfiber or sponge mops. Microfiber

A UNIQUE PHENOMENON – The sponge absorbs water as you mop, so your floors dry in minutes. When not in use, the sponge dries hard so it will not pick up odors or smells like other conventional and sponge mops. When you need to use it again, just soak it in water for a while and it will be restored. Wring out only when the sponge head is completely soft and wet and fully absorbed with water.

Durable and Long-Lasting: PVA mops are made of high-quality materials that are resistant to wear and tear, making them more durable and longer-lasting than traditional mops. Due to the influence of PVA material, it will become hard after drying, please soak in water for 1-5 minutes before use, warm water is better.
body.description: DUDTO PVA Sponge mop This is a 15-inch PVA sponge mop with 60 inches long handle. It's made of PVA, so it's easier to clean, and it doesn't need to be replaced for 6-12 months. Super water absorption is something other mops can not replace. The PVA sponge mop sucks up all the moisture, so you don't need to worry about the residual moisture that will cause you to fall after you mop the floor Size of mop head : 15" Size of mop : 60" Mop pad material : PVA Sponge Mop pad replacement cycle : 6-12months water absorption: 80%-90%

Large size PVA mop 15" PVA sponge mop Head and 60" Long Handle, Make cleaning easier. Quick cleaning It picks up dirt instead of pushing it around like a normal mop, you don’t have to sweep beforehand! Sweep, mop and vacuum all at the same time! Effortlessly trap spills and debris until you are ready to rinse and wring it into your mop bucket. Suitable for a variety of flooring It works best on tiles, hardwood floors, marble, and your kitchen and bathroom. Also suitable for outdoor use. Quick replacement It is easy to remove the mop head

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really picks up moisture
reviews.reviewText: This mop really picks up liquids, is easy to rinse and leaves the drawer floor very dry. So there’s virtually very little time to wait before you can walk across the floor. This mop really picks up liquids, is easy to rinse and leaves the drawer floor very dry. So there’s virtually very little time to wait before you can go back across the floor.The only issue I had with it, which was my own fault. Is it an extra large mop. It makes it a little bit more difficult to work with especially in smaller places.I did find a similar one that was 11 inches I believe and it worked much easier for me. But that’s not saying anything bad about them off in review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cheap plastic moving partsTerrible instructionsand handle too close to the head gets stuck in the mop bucketWould not a return on not satisfied reason.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and works wonderfully. Assembly instructions were a little difficult to follow, but with a little patience, not impossible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have used the PVA mop for years and my last one broke that I have had for a long time. I was searching for another to replace it with and found this new and improved mop. It took me half the time to clean my floors, as it is wider and covers more area. My floors dry in minutes! I love this mop!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Quality is missing!
reviews.reviewText: Initially this mop assembled easily and worked well. After several uses we noticed a brown substance that was discoloring the sponge head. It looked like it was coming from where the sponge connects to the mop assembly. We assumed it was rust. We left it to dry suspended over our utility sink and the “rust” stained the sink which was hard to clean up. The sponge has since hardened to the point if left in hot water for 15 minutes was still too hard for the squeegee to work without breaking the plastic parts and had to be hand squeezed to soften the sponge. In retrospect I could not recommend this mop even though it had an attractive price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This one came defective
reviews.reviewText: I have ordered dozens of these I love them this one won't stay together 😭

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Nice long handle and wide mop head
reviews.reviewText: So upon opening the product I was satisfied with how wide the mop head is. Will mop more area at a time. I was not happy that one of the mop head are ripped *see pics* I don’t like spending my money on new things that don’t come in great shape. I can see this not holding up for long due to the damage in it already. The directions could have also been better. It wasn’t hard to put together per se but you do need to put a little muscle into sliding the mop head on and off and connecting and disconnecting the piece that attached to the pull bar. Be careful though as to not break the plastic. It’s not made super sturdy. We shall see how long it hold up. Not sure right now it’s worth the money. Will update later if need be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very Disappointed . DO NOT BUY
reviews.reviewText: I am very disappointed, I have contacted the sellers explaining things , apparently they do not care to take care of you at all. It takes more then 5-7 minutes to soak and get soften before you can even mop. very hard to maneuvering and takes lot of pressure to mop. Product details does not clearly said that. because of hardness of the sponge Wringing mechanism could break anytime. Complete Waste, Do not BUY
